gov.nih.nlm.ling.brat

Class AbstractAnnotation

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.nih.nlm.ling.brat.AbstractAnnotation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Annotation, java.lang.Comparable<Annotation>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ModificationAnnotation, RelationAnnotation, TermAnnotation

    public abstract class AbstractAnnotation
extends java.lang.Object
implements Annotation
    The generic implementation of the Annotation interface.
    Author:
    Halil Kilicoglu

    • Constructor Detail

      • AbstractAnnotation

        protected AbstractAnnotation(java.lang.String id,
                             java.lang.String docId,
                             java.lang.String annotationType,
                             java.lang.String type)
        Creates a generic Annotation object.
        Parameters:
        id - the annotation id
        docId - the document id
        annotationType - higher-level type as specified by the implementing class (e.g., Term, Relation)
        type - the semantic type (e.g., Drug, Disease)
